summary: how to skip simply bethesda intro logo
descriptionHtml:
no mod the download is a txt file.

To skip the bethesda intro logo you have to do a simply thing.

in the skyrim/data/video 

change the name of BGS_Logo.bik to BGS_Logo2.bik and then launch the game and enjoy.
Why i said to change the name instead of felete : because i whant to let the game as original so do what you whant.

if you like this tell it to the discution ^^.
author: luckytln
